name: @olton/datetime
description: Datetime is a minimalist JavaScript library that parses, validates, manipulates, and displays dates and times for node and modern browsers with a comfortable modern API.

scripts.build: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 MODE=production node build.js
scripts.dev: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 MODE=development node build.js
